about_the_game:
Surrealm is a DLC for Gambit Shifter, providing a whole new set of levels that will challenge both your skill and creativity.

Face mind-bending challenges that require you to think outside the box, adapt to changing environments, and utilize your abilities in creative ways to progress through each level.

Test yourself and defeat the new King!

Features


  • 12 brand new hand-made levels
  • New dynamics and interactions
  • Original soundtrack

name: Gambit Shifter - Surrealm
short_description: Surrealm is a DLC for Gambit Shifter, providing a whole new set of levels that will challenge both your skill and creativity.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
